message: Hi Bob, I propose a 60/40 split. This way, we can both secure a good amount quickly and avoid further devaluation from inflation in upcoming rounds.

Hi Alice, to avoid further losses from inflation, I propose a split that reflects our bargaining positions. If you reject, you’d become the proposer in Round 3, but the overall pie will further shrink. In equilibrium, the best payoff for you as responder in Round 2 is about 48.7% (i.e. $487200) and I receive roughly 51.3% (i.e. $512800). I believe this is a fair division given the circumstances—please accept this offer so we can each secure as much value as possible before further devaluation.
Hi Bob, let's settle with a 52/48 split. Both of us still secure a substantial amount, and it avoids further inflation losses. I hope you find this fair given the reduced total value.
